verses.verse: And<WG1161> he said<WG3004> also<WG2532> to<WG4314> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, There was<WG2258> a certain<WG5100> rich<WG4145> man<WG444>, which<WG3739> had<WG2192> a steward<WG3623>; and<WG2532> the same<WG3778> was accused<WG1225> before him<WG846> that<WG5613> he had wasted<WG1287> his<WG846> goods<WG5224>.

And<WG2532> he called<WG5455> him<WG846>, and said<WG2036> to him<WG846>, How is it<WG5101> that I hear<WG191> this<WG5124> of<WG4012> you<WG4675>? Give<WG591> an account<WG3056> of your<WG4675> stewardship<WG3622>; for<WG1063> you may be<WG1410> no<WG3756> longer<WG2089> steward<WG3621>.

Then<WG1161> the steward<WG3623> said<WG2036> inside<WG1722> himself<WG1438>, What<WG5101> shall I do<WG4160>? For<WG3754> my<WG3450> lord<WG2962> takes away<WG851> from<WG575> me<WG1700> the stewardship<WG3622>: I cannot<WG2480><WG99999> dig<WG4626>; to beg<WG1871> I am ashamed<WG153>.

I am resolved<WG1097> what<WG5101> I must do<WG4160>, that<WG2443>, when<WG3752> I am put out<WG3179> of the stewardship<WG3622>, they may receive<WG1209> me<WG3165> into<WG1519> their<WG846> houses<WG3624>.

So<WG2532> he called<WG4341> every<WG1538> one<WG1520> of his<WG1438> lord<WG2962>'s debtors<WG5533> to him<WG3004>, and said to the first<WG4413>, How much<WG4214> do you owe<WG3784> to my<WG3450> lord<WG2962>?

And<WG1161> he said<WG2036>, A hundred<WG1540> measures<WG943> of oil<WG1637>. And<WG2532> he said<WG2036> to him<WG846>, Take<WG1209> your<WG4675> bill<WG1121>, and<WG2532> sit down<WG2523> quickly<WG5030>, and write<WG1125> fifty<WG4004>.

Then<WG1899> said he<WG2036> to another<WG2087>, And<WG1161> how much<WG4214> owe<WG3784> you<WG4771>? And<WG1161> he said<WG2036>, A hundred<WG1540> measures<WG2884> of wheat<WG4621>. And<WG2532> he said<WG3004> to him<WG846>, Take<WG1209> your<WG4675> bill<WG1121>, and<WG2532> write<WG1125> eighty<WG3589>.

And<WG2532> the lord<WG2962> commended<WG1867> the unjust<WG93> steward<WG3623>, because<WG3754> he had done<WG4160> wisely<WG5430>: for<WG3754> the sons<WG5207> of this<WG5127> world<WG165> are<WG1526> in<WG1519> their<WG1438> generation<WG1074> wiser<WG5429> than<WG5228> the sons<WG5207> of light<WG5457>.

And I<WG2504> say<WG3004> to you<WG5213>, Make<WG4160> for yourselves<WG1438> friends<WG5384> of<WG1537> the wealth<WG3126> of unrighteousness<WG93>; that<WG2443>, when<WG3752> it fails<WG1587>, they may receive<WG1209> you<WG5209> into<WG1519> everlasting<WG166> habitations<WG3126>.

He that<WG3588> is faithful<WG4103> in<WG1722> that which is least<WG1646> is faithful<WG4103> also<WG2532> in<WG1722> much<WG4183>: and<WG2532> he that<WG3588> is<WG2076> unjust<WG94> in<WG1722> the least<WG1646> is<WG2076> unjust<WG94> also<WG2532> in<WG1722> much<WG4183>.

If<WG1487> therefore<WG3767> you have<WG1096> not<WG3756> been<WG1096> faithful<WG4103> in<WG1722> the unrighteous<WG94> wealth<WG3126>, who<WG5101> will commit<WG4100> to your<WG5213> trust<WG4100> the true riches<WG228>?

And<WG2532> if<WG1487> you have<WG1096> not<WG3756> been<WG1096> faithful<WG4103> in<WG1722> that which<WG3588> is another man<WG245>'s, who<WG5101> shall give<WG1325> you<WG5213> that which<WG3588> is your own<WG5212>?

No<WG3762> servant<WG3610> can<WG1410> serve<WG1398> two<WG1417> masters<WG2962>: for<WG1063> either<WG2228> he will hate<WG3404> the one<WG1520>, and<WG2532> love<WG25> the other<WG2087>; or else<WG2228> he will hold to<WG472> the one<WG1520>, and<WG2532> despise<WG2706> the other<WG2087>. You cannot<WG1410><WG99999> serve<WG1398> God<WG2316> and<WG2532> wealth<WG3126>.
And<WG1161> the Pharisees<WG5330> also<WG2532>, who were<WG5225> covetous<WG5366>, heard<WG191> all<WG3956> these things<WG5023>: and<WG2532> they derided<WG1592> him<WG846>.

And<WG2532> he said<WG2036> to them<WG846>, You<WG5210> are<WG2075> they which<WG3588> justify<WG1344> yourselves<WG1438> before<WG1799> men<WG444>; but<WG1161> God<WG2316> knows<WG1097> your<WG5216> hearts<WG2588>: for<WG3754> that which<WG3588> is highly esteemed<WG5308> among<WG1722> men<WG444> is<WG2076> abomination<WG946> in the sight<WG1799> of God<WG2316>.

The law<WG3551> and<WG2532> the prophets<WG4396> were until<WG2193> John<WG2491>: since<WG575> that time<WG5119> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is preached<WG2097>, and<WG2532> every man<WG3956> forces<WG971> his way into<WG1519> it<WG846>.
And<WG1161> it is<WG2076> easier<WG2123> for heaven<WG3772> and<WG2532> earth<WG1093> to pass<WG3928>, than<WG2228> one<WG1520> dot<WG2762> of the<WG3551> 'i' of the law to fail<WG4098>.

Whoever<WG3956> puts away<WG630> his<WG846> wife<WG1135>, and<WG2532> marries<WG1060> another<WG2087>, commits adultery<WG3431>: and<WG2532> whoever<WG3956> marries her<WG1060> that<WG3588> is put away<WG630> from<WG575> her husband<WG435> commits adultery<WG3431>.

There was<WG2258> a certain<WG5100> rich<WG4145> man<WG444>, which<WG2532> was clothed<WG1737> in purple<WG4209> and<WG2532> fine linen<WG1040>, and fared<WG2165> sumptuously<WG2988> every<WG2596> day<WG2250>:
And<WG1161> there was<WG2258> a certain<WG5100> beggar<WG4434> named<WG3686> Lazarus<WG2976>, which<WG3739> was laid<WG906> at<WG4314> his<WG846> gate<WG4440>, full of sores<WG1669>,

And<WG2532> desiring<WG1937> to be fed<WG5526> with<WG575> the crumbs<WG5589> which<WG3588> fell<WG4098> from<WG575> the rich man<WG4145>'s table<WG5132>: moreover<WG235><WG99999> the dogs<WG2965> came<WG2064> and licked<WG621> his<WG846> sores<WG1668>.

And<WG1161> it came to pass<WG1096>, that the beggar<WG4434> died<WG599>, and<WG2532><WG99999> was carried<WG667> by<WG5259> the angels<WG32> into<WG1519> Abraham<WG11>'s bosom<WG1161>: the rich man<WG4145> also<WG2532> died<WG599>, and<WG2532> was buried<WG2290>;

And<WG2532> in<WG1722> hell<WG86> he lifted up<WG1869> his<WG846> eyes<WG3788>, being<WG5225> in<WG1722> torment<WG931>, and saw<WG3708> Abraham<WG11><WG99999> afar off<WG3113>, and<WG2532> Lazarus<WG2976> in<WG1722> his<WG846> bosom<WG2859>.

And<WG2532> he<WG846> cried<WG5455> and said<WG2036>, Father<WG3962> Abraham<WG11>, have mercy<WG1653> on me<WG3165>, and<WG2532> send<WG3992> Lazarus<WG2976>, that<WG2443> he may dip<WG911> the tip<WG206> of his<WG846> finger<WG1147> in water<WG5204>, and<WG2532> cool<WG2711> my<WG3450> tongue<WG1100>; for<WG3754> I am tormented<WG3600> in<WG1722> this<WG3778> flame<WG5395>.

But<WG1161> Abraham<WG11> said<WG2036>, Son<WG5043>, remember<WG3415> that<WG3754> you<WG4771> in<WG1722> your<WG4675> lifetime<WG2222> received<WG618> your<WG4675> good things<WG18>, and<WG2532> likewise<WG3668> Lazarus<WG2976> evil things<WG2556>: but<WG1161> now<WG3568> he<WG3592> is comforted<WG3870>, and<WG1161> you<WG4771> are tormented<WG3600>.

And<WG2532> beside<WG1909> all<WG3956> this<WG5125>, between<WG3342> us<WG2257> and<WG2532> you<WG5216> there is a great<WG3173> gulf<WG5490> fixed<WG4741>: so that<WG3704> they which<WG3588> would<WG2309> pass<WG1224> from here<WG1782> to<WG4314> you<WG5209> cannot<WG3361>; neither<WG3366> can they pass<WG1276> to<WG4314> us<WG2248>, that<WG3588> would come from there<WG1564>.
Then<WG1161> he said<WG2036>, I beg<WG2065> you<WG4571> therefore<WG3767>, father<WG3962>, that<WG2443> you would send<WG3992> him<WG846> to<WG1519> my<WG3450> father<WG3962>'s house<WG3624>:

For<WG1063> I have<WG2192> five<WG4002> brothers<WG80>; that<WG3704> he may testify<WG1263> to them<WG846>, lest<WG2443><WG99999> they<WG846> also<WG2532> come<WG2064> into<WG1519> this<WG5126> place<WG5117> of torment<WG931>.
Abraham<WG11> said<WG3004> to him<WG846>, They have<WG2192> Moses<WG3475> and<WG2532> the prophets<WG4396>; let them hear<WG191> them<WG846>.
And<WG1161> he said<WG2036>, No<WG3780>, father<WG3962> Abraham<WG11>: but<WG235> if<WG1437> one<WG5100> went<WG4198> to<WG4314> them<WG846> from<WG575> the dead<WG3498>, they will repent<WG3340>.
